text: Jamie Foxx, is an American movie, television, voice actor, comedian, singer- songwriter, and radio talk show host. He is known for his roles in; Ray, Django Unchained, Law Abiding Citizens, Horrible Bosses, The Soloist, The Amazing Spider-Man 2 and Spider-Man: No Way Home. He had his own show, The Jamie Foxx Show. Foxx is an African American. He was born on January 13, 1983 in Terrell, Texas. He has two daughters, Corinne and Annalise Foxx. In April 2023, Foxx was hospitalized after having a brain hemorrhage that led to a stroke. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Official Jamie Foxx music site * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:Actors from Texas Category:African-American comedians Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American radio actors Category:Rappers from Texas Category:American adoptees Category:Singer-songwriters from Texas Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Comedians from Texas Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners
title: Jamie Foxx
